EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Boston
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Boston.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Friday, July 15th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/boston]]>
Location Pivotal Boston <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/boston]]> 145 Broadway, 3rd Floor Cambridge, MA 02142 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/145+Broadway,+Cambridge,+MA+02142/@42.364932,-71.0910598,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89e370ae56c77775:0x6f67dbaf689fcdac!8m2!3d42.3649281!4d-71.0888711]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
